title: A Short List Of The Best 'Longform' Journalism Of 2014
teaser: Editors at Longform read hundreds of print and online journalism pieces each year. Co-founder Max Linsky talks to Audie Cornish about highlights from 2014, from literary stalwarts and upstarts alike.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
